name: Human Welfare Charitable Trust

address: Suite 401, Meghdoot Apartments, Evershine Nagar, Linking Road, Malad West.

briefDescription: he Human Welfare Charitable Trust (HWCT) is a public charitable trust working for the socio-economic development of the weaker sections of the society.Education, healthcare and environment are some of the areas the HWCT is mainly focusing upon. The goal of the foundation is to help create a society where everyone is equal and prosperous and there is justice for all. With an aim to reduce the gap between haves and have-nots, the HWCT is working to provide all the basic resources to the poor and needy that are necessary to live, survive and grow gracefully in a society.
